name: Remilia Scarlet's Rampage
description:
You can play this game on the Scratch website here if you want to :

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/745864384/

Warning : 

This game has loud noises, flashing lights and jumpscares! If you're under 10, don't report this leave immediately.

ALSO : 

I don't own Touhou.

Notes : 

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Best played at full volume.

Story : 

You woke up in a strange area with not doors and has many identical corridors. The area is not safe and has a ghostly entity roaming around the area. In order to escape, you must find 7 unidentified objects that have the shape of a diamond.

Music & Sounds go to their respective owners.
